body_html: There is however a setup step in alias multinomial. It can be hidden using a single function that does the setup first time and then simply draws from then on but would probably be more useful to leave it open.
body_text: There is however a setup step  in alias multinomial. It can be hidden using a single function that does the setup first time and then simply draws from then on but would probably be more useful to leave it open.
body: There is however a [setup step](https://github.com/torch/torch7/blob/aed31711c6b8846b8337a263a7f9f998697994e7/doc/maths.md#state-torchmultinomialaliassetupprobs)  in alias multinomial. It can be hidden using a single function that does the setup first time and then simply draws from then on but would probably be more useful to leave it open.
